entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: simple console logger should support singleline except for exception use case #110793
    Future
  • 在实操中采用Console.WriteLine方法输出派生类的基类引用出的基类成员时出现System.FormatException:“Input string was not in a correct format.错误，更改格式化方式后恢复正常 #110785
  • Consider improving FrozenSet for byte/char #110783
    Future
  • Tensor.StdDev does not handle non-contiguous input #110772
  • [mono][tvos] DataSet Xml serialization tests failing on tvos lanes #110771
  • JsonNumberHandling.AllowReadingFromString on class-level fails for double[][], but works in JsonSourceGenerationOptions #110770
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix3x2 Regression on 12/13/2024 1:28:01 PM #110789
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 12/12/2024 1:14:47 PM #110788
  • Access Violation Exception after upgrading from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110769
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/stubs_do/stubs_do.cmd #110763

Closed

  • Removal of Helper Method Frames (HMF) #110767
    Future
  • Unable to build Solution that contains multi-targeted projects and using ArtifactsPath with IncludeProjectNameInArtifactsPaths set to false #110791
  • There's no way to call native library resolution on a specific AssemblyLoadContext #13472
  • [NativeAOT] `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` does not work with closed delegates over instance methods on value types #108688
    10.0.0
  • Dotnet 9 new DLL's not found #110786
  • [API Proposal]: Implement `IReadOnlyList<T>` in `LinkedList<T>` or create `IReadOnlyLinkedList<T>` and `IReadOnlyLinkedListNode<T>` #110784
  • ILC: missing warning for DAM on type when used through derived type #104740
    10.0.0
  • [browser][hybridglobalization][aot] `Assert.StartsWith` cannot find a match #102373
    10.0.0
  • Possible Task.WhenAll performance improvements #110530
  • System.ValueTuple - compatibility issue between net 4.8 and net standard 2.0 #84618
  • Delegate for Generic Interface methods #4611
  • Need script to get crossgen for current dotnet runtime on linux #11688

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Tizen linux-armel build #110792
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove workaround for fixed Roslyn bug in HttpHeaders #110790
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • JIT: revise how we track if nodes have been morphed #110787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid array allocation in Task.WhenAll? #110777
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Remove `FCThrow`s from Reflection APIs. #110766
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110765
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110762
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` for valuetype methods #110782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use floating tag for webassembly image #109374
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Update TagName docs to include behavior if tag is not found #109934
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Remove DiagnosticSource reference from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #110458
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.13
  • exclude obj/cmake from codeql. #110630
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix templates patch in the bench #110779
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix base type marking for DAM annotated classes #110655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable bundle archive building in source build #110448
    blocked, blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix rebuild of browser-bench with startup apps #110776
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix native aot outerloop #110768
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ambiguous call build break in Fuzzing project #110761
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110627
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Avoid a list/array allocation in Task.WhenAll(enumerable) #110536
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110744
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND/NF feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Expression.Compile: empty the evaluation stack before evaluating second expression in OrElse and AndAlso #110721
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [browser] Add `OutputType=Library` tests #110731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2603456 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling. #110732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Additional Tar tests for filled in size when data is empty #107815
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [JIT] Improve x86 HWIntrinsic containment #110736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Abort after handling native `SIGSEGV` crash when chaining fails on iOS-like platforms #110741
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Change condition for packs set in MSBuild #110389
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update armv6 image #102899
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cDAC] Use Moq in CodeVersionsTest #110750
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add linux-riscv64 nativeaot runtime build #110688
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Specify a security descriptor when using global Mutex #110416
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, 10.0.0
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix nativeaot outerloop #109010
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.StartRequestAsync assertion failed #109799
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Limit OpenSSL TLS Session cache for client SSL_CTX instances #110154
    area-System.Net.Security, 10.0.0
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #110165
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • Add Dispose for X509Chain instance #110740
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • Added check of RequiresValidationContext before calling IsValid #110647
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • vxsort: Add Arm64 Neon implementation and tests #110692
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ReadBufferState dispose cases #110739
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Vectorize System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary #110701
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Collections
